about_the_game:
You want to get in the Christmas spirit?

Then don't miss the opportunity to test your skills in the second add-on for Cast Cats! It's a FREE Christmas update that will give you 14 new levels with pleasant holiday music!

In Xmas Pack, the cats are busy with holiday chores and activities: molding snowmen, decorating the tree, giving presents, sledding and giving you smiles! Feel the coming of Christmas with these cuties!

Features:

  • 14 new levels

  • New music

  • New Steam-achievements

  • The game is suitable for children and adults

  • New Year mood!

In Xmas Pack, the cats are busy with holiday chores and activities: molding snowmen, decorating the tree, giving presents, sledding and giving you smiles! Feel the coming of Christmas with these cuties!

name: Cast Cats - Xmas Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400, AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 660, AMD Radeon R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8600, AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1660, AMD Radeon RX 5500 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

short_description: Don't miss this FREE New Year's update to get you in the holiday spirit!
